original_title: Jay-Z and Linkin Park - Collision Course
overview: The Once-in-a-Lifetime performance, captured live July 18th, 2004 at the Roxy Theater in West Hollywood, CA. In this revealing documentary, you'll also go behind the scenes to witness how, in just four days, Jay-Z and Linkin Park made music history.
title: Jay-Z and Linkin Park - Collision Course
